Key Match Events: David Fry hit a two-run home run in the seventh inning
David Fry bunted home an insurance run in the ninth inning
José Ramírez hit a solo home run in the fifth inning
Trey Sweeney hit an RBI sacrifice fly in the second inning
Post-Match Reflections: David Fry is one of the best baseball players in this league
It’s always comforting to have Tarik Skubal on the mound
We have a bunch of tough dudes. We get down 2-1 and we’re in the locker room like it’s just another day. We show up ready to play to try and get a win. And let’s go win Game 5
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland ended a streak of 11 losses in postseason elimination games dating to Game 6 of 1997 World Series
Clase preserved a 4-3 lead in the eighth when he escaped a second-and-third jam by striking out Trey Sweeney on a 100.9 mph cutter
Lane Thomas ended the Guardians' 20-inning scoreless streak with a two-out RBI single in the first off Reese Olson
